$documentation.purpose: Stage-specific traceability register for the Prototype phase. Tracks screen progress from discovery through implementation.
$documentation.phase_position: Stage register - aggregates screen_registry data with implementation status

checkpoints.9: ALL Discovery screens MUST have spec folders
checkpoints.12: ALL screen specs MUST have React component code
checkpoints.13: ALL React screens MUST have test files

validation_rules: Blocking checkpoints MUST pass before progressing to next stage
